1.name: Metropolis
1.description: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

2.name: Sunrise: A Song of Two Humans
2.description: An allegorical tale about a man fighting the good and evil within him. Both sides are made flesh - one a sophisticated woman he is attracted to and the other his wife.

3.name: Wings
3.description: Two young men, one rich, one middle class, who are in love with the same woman, become fighter pilots in World War I.

4.name: The Lodger: A Story of the London Fog
4.description: A landlady suspects her new lodger is the madman killing women in London.

5.name: The Jazz Singer
5.description: The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of becoming a jazz singer.

6.name: London After Midnight
6.description: The abandoned home of a wealthy man who supposedly committed suicide five years earlier is taken over by ghoulish figures - could they be vampires?

7.name: Napoléon vu par Abel Gance
7.description: A film about the French general's youth and early military career.

8.name: It
8.description: A salesgirl with plenty of "it" (sex appeal) pursues a handsome playboy.

9.name: 7th Heaven
9.description: A street cleaner saves a young woman's life, and the pair slowly fall in love until war intervenes.

10.name: College
10.description: To reconcile with his girlfriend, a bookish college student tries to become an athlete.

11.name: The Unknown
11.description: A criminal on the run hides in a circus and seeks to possess the daughter of the ringmaster at any cost.

12.name: The Cat and the Canary
12.description: Relatives of an eccentric millionaire gather in his spooky mansion on the 20th anniversary of his death for the reading of his will.

13.name: The Ring
13.description: Two boxers compete for the love of a woman.

14.name: The Kid Brother
14.description: A sheriff's milquetoast son has a chance to prove himself when a medicine show run by con artists comes into town.

15.name: Underworld
15.description: Boisterous gangster kingpin Bull Weed rehabilitates his former lawyer from his alcoholic haze, but complications arise when he falls for Weed's girlfriend.

16.name: Oktyabr
16.description: In documentary style, events in Petrograd are re-enacted from the end of the monarchy in February of 1917 to the end of the provisional government and the decrees of peace and of land in ...                See full summary »

17.name: Uncle Tom's Cabin
17.description: Slavery tears apart a black family in the South before the start of the Civil War.

18.name: The King of Kings
18.description: Jesus Christ faces religious and political oppression during his ministry and in the days before his death and resurrection.

19.name: Downhill
19.description: Public schoolboy Roddy Berwick is expelled from school when he takes the blame for a friend's charge and his life falls apart in a series of misadventures.

20.name: Love
20.description: A married woman compromises her social standing and family life when she falls for a young officer.

21.name: Two Arabian Knights
21.description: Two American soldiers are captured by the Germans on the Western Front during World War One and escape a POW camp only to stumble into further life-threatening adventures when they come across an Arabian king's daughter while on the lam.

22.name: West Point
22.description: Wealthy Brice Wayne enters West Point and, though he does well on the football field, angers fellow cadets with his arrogance. Disciplined by the coach he yells "To hell with the Corps!" ...                See full summary »

23.name: The Way of All Flesh
23.description: The story takes place in Milwaukee during the early 1900s with a bank clerk named August Schiller who is happy with both his job and his family. He is tasked with transporting $1,000 in ...                See full summary »

24.name: The Show
24.description: Performers in a Budapest sideshow encounter love, greed, and murder.

25.name: Mr. Wu
25.description: When Mandarin Wu's unmarried daughter becomes pregnant by a young Englishman, he seeks vengeance.

26.name: Chicago
26.description: Based on a true crime story, the movie is about a wild jazz-loving and boozing wife Roxie Hart who kills her boyfriend in cold blood after he leaves her, and how she finagles her way out ...                See full summary »

27.name: En perfekt gentleman
27.description: The old Luny Palace in Paris has been purchased by the newly rich and pompous widow Charlotte Ponson.

28.name: Ham and Eggs at the Front
28.description: Fifi (Mryna Loy)), a dusky, sultry Senegalese spy, uses her wiles to get information out of two American army soldiers, Ham(Tom Wilson) and Eggs (Heinie Conklin), in France during World War two.

29.name: The Student Prince in Old Heidelberg
29.description: A cloistered, overprotected Austrian prince falls in love with a down-to-earth barmaid in this "Viennese fairy tale."

30.name: Barbed Wire
30.description: During WWI, a French farm girl and a German P.O.W. fall in love.

31.name: My Best Girl
31.description: A department store's stock girl falls in love with a co-worker, the son of the store's manager; the feeling is mutual though he is engaged to a debutante and focusing on becoming successful without the influence of his father.

32.name: Die Liebe der Jeanne Ney
32.description: In the Crimea, the Reds and the Whites aren't done fighting, and Jeanne discovers that the man she loves is a Bolshevik (when he kills her father). Penniless, she returns to Paris where she...                See full summary »

33.name: Annie Laurie
33.description: The story of the famous battle between the Scots clans of Macdonald and Campbell, and the young woman who comes between them, Annie Laurie.

34.name: Get Your Man
34.description: A young American girl in Paris falls in love with a handsome nobleman, but he is about to wed in an arranged marriage. She hatches a plan to overcome that obstacle and get her man.

35.name: Nevada
35.description: A gunslinger looking for a quiet place to settle down becomes entangled in a romantic triangle and the hunt for a gang of cattle rustlers.

36.name: Hula
36.description: The daughter of a pineapple plantation owner in Hawaii sets her sights on a married English engineer.

37.name: When a Man Loves
37.description: A nobleman studying for the priesthood abandons his vocation in 18th Century France when he falls in love with a beautiful, but reluctant, courtesan.

38.name: Tretya meshchanskaya
38.description: A married couple have a small apartment in Moscow. When an old friend of the husband's arrives in the city, he is unable to find lodgings. Kolia, the husband, invites his friend to move in with them.

39.name: Children of Divorce
39.description: A young flapper tricks her childhood sweetheart into marrying her. He really loves another woman, but didn't marry her for fear the marriage would end in divorce, like his parents'. Complications ensue.

40.name: Tarzan and the Golden Lion
40.description: Flora Hawks is in love with the overseer of Tarzan's African estate. After a search for a legendary city of diamonds, Tarzon races with his pet lion Jad-bal-ja to save Haws from being sacrificed to a lion-god.

41.name: The Gaucho
41.description: A girl is saved by a miracle after she falls from a cliff in the Argentine Andes, and is blessed with healing powers. A shrine is built on the site, and a whole city grows around it, rich ...                See full summary »

42.name: For the Love of Mike
42.description: Three men join forces to raise an adopted son.

43.name: Tiptoes
43.description: A silent film version of the Gershwin stage musical

44.name: Hotel Imperial
44.description: During World War I, a hotel maid and Austrian officer in hiding attempt to survive in a Russian-occupied town.

45.name: La sirène des tropiques
45.description: Marquis Sévéro, a rich, lazy Parisian, wants to divorce his wife so that he can marry his own goddaughter Denise. But Denise herself loves André Berval, an engineer employed by the marquis....                See full summary »

46.name: The Drop Kick
46.description: College football player Jack Hamill finds his reputation on the line when he pays an innocent visit to a woman whose husband kills himself.

47.name: Resurrection
47.description: Katusha, a country girl, is seduced and abandoned by Prince Nekludov. Nekludov finds himself, years later, on a jury trying the same Katusha for a crime he now realizes his actions drove ...                See full summary »

49.name: Mockery
49.description: During the Russian Revolution, a mentally challenged peasant saves then obsesses over a beautiful countess.

50.name: Old San Francisco
50.description: In San Francisco, a villainous land owner with underworld connections seeks to steal the property of an old Spanish family.
